import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ItemList=()=>{const[items,setItems]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchItems=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://3.29.24.171:3001/api/items');setItems(response.data);}catch(err){setError('Failed to fetch items.');}};fetchItems();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Item List"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"item-list",children:items.length>0?items.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/edit/${item._id}`,className:"btn",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/delete/${item._id}`,className:"btn btn-danger",children:"Delete"})]},item._id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No items available"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/create",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Create New Item"})]});};export default ItemList;
